value.title: China outstrips GPT-3 with even more ambitious AI language model
value.excerpt: A Chinese AI institute has unveiled a new natural language processing ( NLP) model that is even more sophisticated than those created by both Google and OpenAI. value.title: What Artificial Intelligence Still Can’t Do
value.excerpt: Modern artificial intelligence is capable of wonders. It can produce breathtaking original content: poetry, prose, images, music, human faces. It can diagnose some medical conditions more accurately than a human physician.

value.title: Why natural language processing is AI’s jewel in the crown
